greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest parameter k such that (n+k!)/n is prime.
comment: a(n) >= A002034(n). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 15 2011
link: Jinyuan Wang, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..877
mathematica: a = {}; Do[k = 1; While[ ! PrimeQ[(k! + n)/n], k++ ]; AppendTo[a, k], {n, 1, 100}]; a
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Apr 07 2008
